mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.staff_id AS "staffId", a.staff_name AS "staffName", a.rater_id AS "raterId", a.rater_name AS "raterName", a.rater_level AS "raterLevel", a.percents AS "percents", a.job_level AS "jobLevel", a.job_level_id AS "jobLevelId", a.template_id AS "templateId", a.number1 AS "number1", a.number2 AS "number2", a.number3 AS "number3", a.number4 AS "number4", a.number5 AS "number5", a.number6 AS "number6", a.number7 AS "number7", a.number8 AS "number8", a.number9 AS "number9", a.number10 AS "number10", a.number11 AS "number11", a.number12 AS "number12", a.number13 AS "number13", a.number14 AS "number14", a.number15 AS "number15", a.number16 AS "number16", a.number17 AS "number17", a.number18 AS "number18", a.number19 AS "number19", a.number20 AS "number20", a.number21 AS "number21", a.number22 AS "number22", a.number23 AS "number23", a.number24 AS "number24", a.remark1 AS "remark1", a.remark2 AS "remark2", a.remark3 AS "remark3", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.pre_status AS "preStatus", a.status_change_date AS "statusChangeDate", a.save_flag AS "saveFlag", a.end_date AS "endDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_staff_result_score( id, staff_id, staff_name, rater_id, rater_name, rater_level, percents, job_level, job_level_id, template_id, number1, number2, number3, number4, number5, number6, number7, number8, number9, number10, number11, number12, number13, number14, number15, number16, number17, number18, number19, number20, number21, number22, number23, number24, remark1, remark2, remark3, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, pre_status, status_change_date, save_flag, end_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{raterId}, #{raterName}, #{raterLevel}, #{percents}, #{jobLevel}, #{jobLevelId}, #{templateId}, #{number1}, #{number2}, #{number3}, #{number4}, #{number5}, #{number6}, #{number7}, #{number8}, #{number9}, #{number10}, #{number11}, #{number12}, #{number13}, #{number14}, #{number15}, #{number16}, #{number17}, #{number18}, #{number19}, #{number20}, #{number21}, #{number22}, #{number23}, #{number24}, #{remark1}, #{remark2}, #{remark3}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{preStatus}, #{statusChangeDate}, #{saveFlag}, #{endDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cp_staff_result_score SET staff_id = #{staffId}, staff_name = #{staffName}, rater_id = #{raterId}, rater_name = #{raterName}, rater_level = #{raterLevel}, percents = #{percents}, job_level = #{jobLevel}, job_level_id = #{jobLevelId}, template_id = #{templateId}, number1 = #{number1}, number2 = #{number2}, number3 = #{number3}, number4 = #{number4}, number5 = #{number5}, number6 = #{number6}, number7 = #{number7}, number8 = #{number8}, number9 = #{number9}, number10 = #{number10}, number11 = #{number11}, number12 = #{number12}, number13 = #{number13}, number14 = #{number14}, number15 = #{number15}, number16 = #{number16}, number17 = #{number17}, number18 = #{number18}, number19 = #{number19}, number20 = #{number20}, number21 = #{number21}, number22 = #{number22}, number23 = #{number23}, number24 = #{number24}, remark1 = #{remark1}, remark2 = #{remark2}, remark3 = #{remark3}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, pre_status = #{preStatus}, status_change_date = #{statusChangeDate}, save_flag = #{saveFlag}, end_date = #{endDate} WHERE id = #{id}
